events.title: Youth Boycotts Slow Furniture Production
events.text: A nationwide movement in the United States has led to a boycott of GreenHaus furniture, slowing down their plants' output.

events.title: New Highway Expected to Spike Emissions
events.text: With the grand opening of a new 15-lane highway, local emissions and pollution are expected to increase significantly.

events.title: Popular Online Celebrity Donates To Conservation Efforts
events.text: A famous YouTuber known for annual charity events raised thousands of dollars for a conservation group who aim to restore a South American rainforest.

events.title: GreenHaus Opens New Luxury Furniture Factory
events.text: Controversial luxury furniture manufacturer GreenHaus opened a new factory nearby their flagship facility. Critics argue the nearby rainforest will be heavily damaged from the increased pollution.

events.title: Gender Reveal Gone Wrong Starts Wildfire!
events.text: A couple celebrating their next child by created a pink-colored bonfire that eventually spread into the nearby rainforest. This is the 45th gender reveal-related wildfire that has occurred this year.

events.title: Gasoline Tanker Explosion Engulfs Local Rainforest
events.text: An gas tanker carrying thousands of gallons of gasoline crashed and later exploded. While nobody was harmed, a fire began to rage in the nearby rainforest.

events.title: Downed Powerline Sparks Wildfire
events.text: A recent windstorm knocked over a power line last night, which began a fire in the local

events.title: Charity Golf Tournament Winner Donates to Rainforest Conservation
events.text: Lionel Forest, the winner of the Golf for Good tournament, donated the $100,000 grand prize to a conservation organization fighting deforestation.

events.title: Worldwide Recession Decreases Manufacturing!
events.text: With the stock market's collapse this past Monday, the amount of spending dropped significantly around the world, impacting manufacturing.
events.effect: Pollution levels decrease by 25%, but lose 50% of your Green Points.

events.title: New GreenHaus Chair Causes Outrage
events.text: Luxury furniture company GreenHaus recently released a new chair made from an endangered species of tree found in the rainforest.

events.title: Climate Change Induced Drought Damages Rainforest
events.text: A drought is set to descend upon South America this year, exacerbating environmental decline.
events.effect: Increase pollution levels by 50% for one year.

events.title: Slow Sales Year Causes Factory Shutdown
events.text: A bad sales year for GreenHaus led to a wing of their flagship plant being shut down.

events.title: Environmental Regulations Tightened by New Legislation
events.text: A new set of laws were passed that enforces stronger environmental standards.

events.title: Environmental Regulations Relaxed by New Legislation
events.text: A new set of laws were passed that scales back the enforcement of environmental standards.

events.title: Blockbuster Movie Sparks Massive Donations
events.text: A new movie that centers around the decline of the environment caused an influx of donations to organizations protecting the environment.
